title: You Can't Make This Shit Up
body: Check my match history. My very first Hexakill match of the year, {{champion:55}} gets a HEXAKILL. Didn't Rito say last year she wasn't OP in this mode?

replies.body: So what does it matter that you got your first Hexakill as Kat? You make it sound like it is a bad thing that you got a Hexakill as Kat. Just enjoy your Hexakill and stop with the QQ thread.

> Check my match history. My very first Hexakill match of the year, 

http://i1.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/original/000/000/283/gaijin4koma2_peersblog_1200684608.jpg


>{{champion:55}} gets a HEXAKILL. Didn't Rito say last year she wasn't OP in this mode?

http://media.ign.com/games/image/article/738/738102/gaijin4koma_peersblog_1200684654.jpg
Urf, Ascension, the list goes on and on. Nearly every single game mode that was, is, or will be are stomping grounds for Katarina.

it's a reset champion who probably has the highest pentakill rate. I can't see anyone doubting she'd be good in this mode. 
ESPECIALLY close quarters TT map with no wards to spot 1 woman cleanup crew.

Remember Urf?

Remember how Katarina... was basically the exact same?
